required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial of RN316 (PF-04950615) in Subjects Who Are Intolerant to Statins
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo and Active Controlled, Parallel-group Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of PF-04950615 in Subjects With Primary Hyperlipidemia Or Mixed Dyslipidemia Who Are Intolerant to Statin

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multicenter, double blinded, active and placebo controlled randomized clinical trial to demonstrate a superior lipid lowering effect of RN316 (PF-04950615) compared to placebo in subjects who are statin intolerant.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change from baseline in fasting LDL-C at week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Lipid Parameters at Week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting Total Cholesterol (TC), Apolipoprotein B (Apo B), non HDL-C, Lipoprotein (a) (Lp(a), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride, ApoA-I, and ApoA-II blood concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Lipid Parameters at Week 24
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting Total Cholesterol (TC), LDL-C, Apolipoprotein B (Apo B), non HDL-C, Lipoprotein (a) (Lp(a), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride, ApoA-I, and ApoA-II blood concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Lipid Parameters at Week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Absolute change in fasting LDL-C, TC, HDL-C, non-HDL-C, TG, ApoB, ApoA-I, ApoA-II, and Lp(a)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Lipid Parameters at Week 24
secondary_outcome.description: Absolute change in fasting LDL-C, TC, HDL-C, non-HDL-C, TG, ApoB, ApoA-I, ApoA-II, and Lp(a)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 100mg/dL at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 100mg/dL

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 100mg/dL at week 24
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 100mg/dL

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 70mg/dL at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 70mg/dL

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 70mg/dL at week 24
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C less or equal than 70mg/dL
incidence and titer of anti-drug and neutralizing antibodies

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects discontinuing treatment due to musculoskeletal adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects discontinuing treatment due to musculoskeletal adverse events

intervention.description: 150 mg every 2 weeks by subcutaneous injection for 24 weeks
150 mg every 2 weeks by subcutaneous injection for 24 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Hyperlipidemia
- Statin Intolerant
- Fasting LDL-C > + 70 mg/dL Fasting TG < = 400 mg/dL
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant or breastfeeding females
- Cardiovascular or cerebrovascular event or procedure within 90 days
- Severe or life-threatening adverse events with past use of statins
- Poorly controlled hypertension
